title: The Empty quarter
creator_credit: Richard Taylor, Mostafa Hammuri and I T T Productions
brief_description: Traces the expedition of the Englishman, Wilfred Patrick Thesiger, through the desert of South Arabia, the home of the Bedouin. Provides an intimate insight into the life and customs of the inhabitants of the ‘Empty Quarter’ of Arabia
creator_credit_for_label: Richard Taylor, Mostafa Hammuri and I T T Productions
